data.eml:eml: Bolivian Mimosa (Leguminosae, Mimosoideae): three new species and a species checklist

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Margoth Atahuachi, M. Leontien Van Der Bent, John R. I. Wood, Gwilym P. Lewis, Colin E. Hughes (2016): Bolivian Mimosa (Leguminosae, Mimosoideae): three new species and a species checklist. Phytotaxa 260 (3): 201-222, DOI: 10.11646/phytotaxa.260.3.1
